title: 配置开发环境报错
author: hzy00034
txt_content:
弄了好久还是不行，我在file.minecraft.net/maven上面下载了对应的gradleForge版本，放到本地的maven仓库中还是不行。
官方的libraries.minecraft.net不就是403就是404，一脸懵逼

Forge的1.14.4和1.15.2都是同个报错信息。

Caused by: org.gradle.api.internal.artifacts.ivyservice.DefaultLenientConfiguration$ArtifactResolveException: Could not resolve all files for configuration ':_compileJava_1'.


Caused by: org.gradle.internal.resolve.ModuleVersionResolveException: Could not resolve net.minecraft:client:1.15.2.


Caused by: org.gradle.api.resources.ResourceException: Could not get resource 'https://libraries.minecraft.net/net/minecraft/client/1.15.2/client-1.15.2-extra.jar'


Caused by: org.gradle.internal.resource.transport.http.HttpRequestException: Could not HEAD 'https://libraries.minecraft.net/net/minecraft/client/1.15.2/client-1.15.2-extra.jar'.


这是设置了gradle代理之后出现，没设置的话不出现
Caused by: java.net.SocketException: Can't connect to SOCKS proxy:Connection refused: connect


希望有大佬帮忙解决

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
你代理确认没设置错吗。

试试这里的离线包呢 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-896542-1-1.html

replies.author: hzy00034
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-6-11 15:12
你代理确认没设置错吗。

试试这里的离线包呢 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-896542-1-1.html ...
org.gradle.jvmargs=-DsocksProxyHost=127.0.0.1 -DsocksProxyPort=7077
org.gradle.daemon=false

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
hzy00034 发表于 2020-6-11 15:13
org.gradle.jvmargs=-DsocksProxyHost=127.0.0.1 -DsocksProxyPort=7077
org.gradle.daemon=false
它显示的是无法连接，打开你的什么东西，然后查看下 socks5 是不是监听 7077 端口

replies.author: hzy00034
replies.txt_content:

它显示的是无法连接，打开你的什么东西，然后查看下 socks5 是不是监听 7077 端口 ...
哪里可以看socks5监听的端口号。。我在目录下的build.gradle没有找到socks5这个东西啊。。。
